title: Learn Something: The Difference Between Scales And Modes [News]
text:
Posted 2 hours ago 2 
Guitar instructor Tyler Larson of Music Is Win presented another video lesson, focusing on the differences between scales and modes. 
You can check out the highlights below, watch the video for the whole thing. Scales 
"The first thing you should know is that you shouldn't think of scales as actual notes. Scales should be thought of as intervals - a whole step, half step relationship. So for the major scale, the pattern is Whole, Whole, Half, Whole, Whole, Whole, Half." Modes 
"Here's where we get to modes. Within a single key, we can use a different base note of the notes making that key. We have 7 notes in the major scale, we have potentially 7 different places to start playing the major scale."
